name: Satoshi Iizuka
content: Satoshi Iizuka - University of Tsukuba Japanese / English Satoshi Iizuka Ph.D. in Engineering, Associate Professor Division of Information Engineering, Faculty of Engineering, Information and Systems, University of Tsukuba E-mail: iizukaï¼ATï¼cs.tsukuba.ac.jp Google Scholar News 2023.9.20 One paper accepted to SIGGRAPH Asia 2023 Conference Papers. 2023.6.24 One paper accepted to MICCAI 2023. 2023.6.14 One paper accepted to MVA 2023. 2023.5.9 One paper accepted to Computational Visual Media. 2023.5.4 One paper accepted to Computer Graphics International 2023. 2023.02.18 One paper accepted to ICASSP 2023. 2022.9.1 I have became an Associate Professor. 2021.10.25 One paper accepted to BMVC 2021. 2021.4.16 One paper accepted to CVPR Workshops 2021. 2020.9.2 One paper accepted to IEEE SMC 2020. 2020.8.7 One paper accepted to BMVC 2020. 2020.7.22 Two paper accepted to MICCAI 2020. 2019.9.2 One paper accepted to SIGGRAPH ASIA 2019. 2019.5.1 One paper accepted to ICIP 2019. 2019.4.15 Two papers accepted to CVPR Workshops 2019. 2019.2.27 Two papers accepted to MVA 2019. 2018.4.20 One paper accepted to SIGGRAPH 2018.
